data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
As there does not exist any module which is able to access the
    online banking webpage of the Deutsch Bank I decided to write this
    module. The namespace was choosen in the same way it was done for
    other finance banking modules by other authors. The level ::DE:: is
    inserted between because I don't know if this bank offers webpages
    in other countries, too. Support for other languages ( which would
    be needed to parse table headers in HTML ) will lead to the same
    needs.
